metadata.dc:description: A case of disseminated Mycobacterium africanum infection in a 28 years old black male with no known causes of immunosuppression and resident in Spain 2 years prior to his symptomatology is described. In addition, the characteristics of Mycobacterium africanum and its capacity to produce pathology in man are discussed as is its proper treatment leading to satisfactory cure.
metadata.dc:title: Infecci칩n diseminada por Mycobacterium africanum.
[Disseminated Mycobacterium africanum infection].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de medicina de la Universidad de Navarra
